metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance

parameters.name: SiteDevice
parameters.query:
Heartbeat | where ComputerEnvironment == "Non-Azure" or Computer contains "nva-gw" and TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
 | distinct Computer

content.query: Perf | where TimeGenerated > now() - 30d and TimeGenerated < now() and Computer in~ ({SiteDevice}) and ObjectName == "Load" | summarize heartbeat_per_hour=count() by bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1h, now() - 30d), Computer | extend available_per_hour=iff(heartbeat_per_hour>0, true, false) | summarize total_available_hours=countif(available_per_hour==true) by Computer | extend total_number_of_buckets=round((now()-(now() - 30d))/1h)+1 | extend availability_rate=round(total_available_hours*100/total_number_of_buckets,2) | project Computer, availability_rate
content.title: CloudGen WAN Device Availabilty (30Days)

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog | where DeviceEventClassID == 400 | parse AdditionalExtensions with "tunnel=" tunnel ";host=" host ";transpstate=" transportstate ";tstamp=" tstamp ";nbsamples=" nbsamples ";bwupmin=" bwupmin ";bwupavg=" bwupavg ";bwupmax=" bwupmax ";bwdownmin=" bwdownmin ";bwdownavg=" bwdownavg ";bwdownmax=" bwdownmax ";latencymin=" latencymin ";latencyavg=" latencyavg ";latencymax=" latencymax ";useupstdmin=" useupstdmin ";useupstdavg=" useupstdavg ";useupstdmax=" useupstdmax ";usedownstdmin=" usedownstdmin ";usedownstdavg=" usedownstdavg ";usedownstdmax=" usedownstdmax ";useupndmin="  useupndmin ";useupndavg=" useupndavg ";useupndmax=" useupndmax ";usedownndmin=" usedownndmin ";usedownndavg=" usedownndavg ";usedownndmax=" usedownndmax | where toint(nbsamples) >= 300
| where host in~ ({SiteDevice}) | project TimeGenerated, host, toint(latencyavg), toint(latencymax), toint(latencymin), toint(bwdownmax), toint(bwupmax)
| summarize  Max = round(max(latencymax),1), Min = round(min(latencymin),1), Average = round(avg(latencyavg),1), DMMbps = max(bwdownmax/1000), UPMbps = max(bwupmax/1000), DMKB = max(bwdownmax/8), UMKB = max(bwupmax/8)   by host
//divide by 1000 to get Mbps, by 8 to get kilobytes
content.title: CloudGen WAN Site Performance Summary (1h)

content.query: Perf | where ObjectName == "Site_to_site_VPN_Tunnels_Up" | where Computer in ({SiteDevice}) and Computer !contains "nva-gw" | project-rename Status = ObjectName | project-rename Firewall = Computer | summarize AggregatedValue = round(avg(CounterValue),1) by Firewall, Status | project-rename Qty = AggregatedValue
content.title: Up WAN connections by Device

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where  SourceUserName == '{User}' and Activity == "Activity"
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "reason=" Reason ";cat=" Category ";trafficType=" TrafficType ";deviceCustomString1=" RuleName ";duration=" Duration ";inPkts=" ReceivedPackets ";outPkts=" SentPackets ";protocol=" Protocol ";application=" Application ";target=" Target ";content=" Content
| where Application != ""
| summarize count() by Application
| take 10
content.title: Top Applications

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where  SourceUserName == '{User}' and Activity == "Activity"
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "reason=" Reason ";cat=" Category ";trafficType=" TrafficType ";deviceCustomString1=" RuleName ";duration=" Duration ";inPkts=" ReceivedPackets ";outPkts=" SentPackets ";protocol=" Protocol ";application=" Application ";target=" Target ";content=" Content
| where Category != ""
| summarize count() by Category
| take 10
content.title: Top Category

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where  SourceUserName == '{User}' and Activity == "Activity" 
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "reason=" Reason ";cat=" Category ";trafficType=" TrafficType ";deviceCustomString1=" RuleName ";duration=" Duration ";inPkts=" ReceivedPackets ";outPkts=" SentPackets ";protocol=" Protocol ";application=" Application ";target=" Target ";content=" Content
|where SimplifiedDeviceAction == "Block" or Reason == "URL Domain Explicitly not Allowed by URL Categorization Policy"
| where TrafficType == "IPRX" or TrafficType == "IFWD" and SimplifiedDeviceAction != "Remove" and SimplifiedDeviceAction != "Normal Operation"
| project  TimeGenerated,Computer,  SourceUserName, SourceIP, Reason, Category, Protocol, Application, Target, Content
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| take 100
content.title: Last 100 blocked connections

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where  SourceUserName == '{User}' and Activity == "Activity" 
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "reason=" Reason ";cat=" Category ";trafficType=" TrafficType ";deviceCustomString1=" RuleName ";duration=" Duration ";inPkts=" ReceivedPackets ";outPkts=" SentPackets ";protocol=" Protocol ";application=" Application ";target=" Target ";content=" Content
//|where SimplifiedDeviceAction == "Block" or Reason == "URL Domain Explicitly not Allowed by URL Categorization Policy"
| where TrafficType == "IPRX" or TrafficType == "IFWD" and SimplifiedDeviceAction != "Remove" and SimplifiedDeviceAction != "Normal Operation"
| project  Action = SimplifiedDeviceAction, TimeGenerated,Computer,  SourceUserName, SourceIP, DestinationIP, DestinationPort,  Reason, Category, Protocol, Application, Target, Content
| order by TimeGenerated desc
//| take 100
content.title: Recent Connections

parameters.name: SiteDevices
parameters.label: Sites
parameters.query:
Heartbeat | where ComputerEnvironment == "Non-Azure" or Computer contains "nva-gw" and TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
 | distinct Computer

content.query: Perf | where Computer in~ ({SiteDevices})  | where (ObjectName == "Load") | summarize sum(CounterValue) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
content.title: Load over time

content.query: union Perf | where Computer in~ ({SiteDevices}) and ObjectName == "temperature" and TimeGenerated > now() -  120s and TimeGenerated < now()|  where CounterName == "System_Temperature.value"  | distinct Computer, CounterValue
content.title: CGW Site Device Temperature (Celsius)

content.query:
union Perf | where Computer in~ ({SiteDevices}) and ObjectName == "temperature" and TimeGenerated > now() -  120s and TimeGenerated < now()
|  where CounterName == "CPU_Temperature.value"  | distinct Computer, CounterValue
content.title: CGW Site CPU Temperature (Celsius)

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog | where DeviceEventClassID == 400 | parse AdditionalExtensions with "tunnel=" tunnel ";host=" host ";transpstate=" transportstate ";tstamp=" tstamp ";nbsamples=" nbsamples ";bwupmin=" bwupmin ";bwupavg=" bwupavg ";bwupmax=" bwupmax ";bwdownmin=" bwdownmin ";bwdownavg=" bwdownavg ";bwdownmax=" bwdownmax ";latencymin=" latencymin ";latencyavg=" latencyavg ";latencymax=" latencymax ";useupstdmin=" useupstdmin ";useupstdavg=" useupstdavg ";useupstdmax=" useupstdmax ";usedownstdmin=" usedownstdmin ";usedownstdavg=" usedownstdavg ";usedownstdmax=" usedownstdmax ";useupndmin="  useupndmin ";useupndavg=" useupndavg ";useupndmax=" useupndmax ";usedownndmin=" usedownndmin ";usedownndavg=" usedownndavg ";usedownndmax=" usedownndmax | where toint(nbsamples) >= 300
| where Computer in~ ({SiteDevices})
| distinct Computer, DeviceVersion
content.title: Firmware  Version

content.query:
union Perf 
| where Computer in~ ({SiteDevices}) and ObjectName == "Memory" and TimeGenerated > now() -  60s and TimeGenerated < now()
|  where CounterName == "Available MBytes Memory"  
| distinct Computer, CounterValue
content.title: Free Memory

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceEventClassID == 400 | parse AdditionalExtensions with "tunnel=" tunnel ";host=" host ";transpstate=" transportstate ";tstamp=" tstamp ";nbsamples=" nbsamples ";bwupmin=" bwupmin ";bwupavg=" bwupavg ";bwupmax=" bwupmax ";bwdownmin=" bwdownmin ";bwdownavg=" bwdownavg ";bwdownmax=" bwdownmax ";latencymin=" latencymin ";latencyavg=" latencyavg ";latencymax=" latencymax ";useupstdmin=" useupstdmin ";useupstdavg=" useupstdavg ";useupstdmax=" useupstdmax ";usedownstdmin=" usedownstdmin ";usedownstdavg=" usedownstdavg ";usedownstdmax=" usedownstdmax ";useupndmin="  useupndmin ";useupndavg=" useupndavg ";useupndmax=" useupndmax ";usedownndmin=" usedownndmin ";usedownndavg=" usedownndavg ";usedownndmax=" usedownndmax | where toint(nbsamples) >= 300
| where host in~ ({SiteDevices}) and host !contains "cudanva-gw" | project toint(bwdownavg), toint(bwupavg), host, TimeGenerated | 
summarize avg(bwdownavg/8), avg(bwupavg/8) by host
content.title: Latest WAN Bandwidth Measurement

content.query: union Perf | where Computer in~ ({SiteDevices})| where ObjectName == "Connections_New"
content.title: New Connections

content.query:
Perf| where Computer in~ ({SiteDevices})  and ObjectName == "Site_to_site_VPN_Tunnels_Up" and TimeGenerated > now() - 260s and TimeGenerated < now() 
|where CounterName == "Site_to_site_VPN_Tunnels_Up.value"
| distinct Computer, CounterValue
content.title: VPN Tunnels UP

parameters.name: SiteDevice
parameters.label: Sites
parameters.query:
Heartbeat | where ComputerEnvironment == "Non-Azure" or Computer contains "nva-gw" and TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
 | distinct Computer

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog | where DeviceEventClassID == 400 | parse AdditionalExtensions with "tunnel=" tunnel ";host=" host ";transpstate=" transportstate ";tstamp=" tstamp ";nbsamples=" nbsamples ";bwupmin=" bwupmin ";bwupavg=" bwupavg ";bwupmax=" bwupmax ";bwdownmin=" bwdownmin ";bwdownavg=" bwdownavg ";bwdownmax=" bwdownmax ";latencymin=" latencymin ";latencyavg=" latencyavg ";latencymax=" latencymax ";useupstdmin=" useupstdmin ";useupstdavg=" useupstdavg ";useupstdmax=" useupstdmax ";usedownstdmin=" usedownstdmin ";usedownstdavg=" usedownstdavg ";usedownstdmax=" usedownstdmax ";useupndmin="  useupndmin ";useupndavg=" useupndavg ";useupndmax=" useupndmax ";usedownndmin=" usedownndmin ";usedownndavg=" usedownndavg ";usedownndmax=" usedownndmax | where toint(nbsamples) >= 300
 | where host ==  '{SiteDevice}' 
| project TimeGenerated, host, toint(latencyavg), toint(latencymax), toint(latencymin) 
| summarize  latency = arg_max(latencymin, latencyavg) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
content.title: Latency

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog | where DeviceEventClassID == 400 | parse AdditionalExtensions with "tunnel=" tunnel ";host=" host ";transpstate=" transportstate ";tstamp=" tstamp ";nbsamples=" nbsamples ";bwupmin=" bwupmin ";bwupavg=" bwupavg ";bwupmax=" bwupmax ";bwdownmin=" bwdownmin ";bwdownavg=" bwdownavg ";bwdownmax=" bwdownmax ";latencymin=" latencymin ";latencyavg=" latencyavg ";latencymax=" latencymax ";useupstdmin=" useupstdmin ";useupstdavg=" useupstdavg ";useupstdmax=" useupstdmax ";usedownstdmin=" usedownstdmin ";usedownstdavg=" usedownstdavg ";usedownstdmax=" usedownstdmax ";useupndmin="  useupndmin ";useupndavg=" useupndavg ";useupndmax=" useupndmax ";usedownndmin=" usedownndmin ";usedownndavg=" usedownndavg ";usedownndmax=" usedownndmax | where toint(nbsamples) >= 300
| where host == '{SiteDevice}' | project TimeGenerated, host, toint(useupstdmax), toint(useupstdavg), toint(useupstdmin)
| summarize DM = max(useupstdmax/8), DA = avg(useupstdavg/8), DMin = min(useupstdmin/8) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
//divided by 8 to convert between kilobits and kilobytes, also due to reporting bug useupstd actually returns download
content.title: Download Usage

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog | where DeviceEventClassID == 400 | parse AdditionalExtensions with "tunnel=" tunnel ";host=" host ";transpstate=" transportstate ";tstamp=" tstamp ";nbsamples=" nbsamples ";bwupmin=" bwupmin ";bwupavg=" bwupavg ";bwupmax=" bwupmax ";bwdownmin=" bwdownmin ";bwdownavg=" bwdownavg ";bwdownmax=" bwdownmax ";latencymin=" latencymin ";latencyavg=" latencyavg ";latencymax=" latencymax ";useupstdmin=" useupstdmin ";useupstdavg=" useupstdavg ";useupstdmax=" useupstdmax ";usedownstdmin=" usedownstdmin ";usedownstdavg=" usedownstdavg ";usedownstdmax=" usedownstdmax ";useupndmin="  useupndmin ";useupndavg=" useupndavg ";useupndmax=" useupndmax ";usedownndmin=" usedownndmin ";usedownndavg=" usedownndavg ";usedownndmax=" usedownndmax | where toint(nbsamples) >= 300
| where host == '{SiteDevice}' | project TimeGenerated, host, toint(usedownstdmax), toint(usedownstdavg), toint(usedownstdmin)
| summarize UpMax = max(usedownstdmax/8), UpAvg = avg(usedownstdavg/8), UpMin = min(usedownstdmin/8) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
//values divided by 8 to convert kilobits to kilobytes, and due to bug usedownstd actually represents upload speed.
content.title: Upstream Bandwidth Utilisation

parameters.name: Gateways
parameters.query:
Heartbeat | where  Computer contains "cudanva" and TimeGenerated > ago(1d)
 | distinct Computer

content.title: GW Throughput
